extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN100 or FREN110 or (FREN101 and FREN102).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN232 or FREN312 or FREN300.

basic.description: History of ideas and cultural evolution in French Canada, concentrating mainly on the period from the 19th century to the present day.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Civilisation canadienne-française
